message.content:
{"id": "117981", "title": "Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view", "description": "Description: When attempting to select any item in the library outline view, it cannot be selected on the first attempt.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view
2. Attempt to select any item

Expected Behavior: The selected item should be successfully selected in the library outline view.

Actual Behavior: The focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view, and the selected item cannot be selected.", "OB": "When attempting to select any item in the library outline view for the first time, the focus is unexpectedly jumping to the library file node in the outline view.", "EB": "The selected item should be successfully selected in the library outline view.", "SR": "Investigate the issue causing the focus to jump to the library file node and fix it so that the intended item can be successfully selected in the library outline view."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
